headline: Hess Midstream LP (HESM) Back Under Morgan Stanley’s Radar After Chevron Merger
summary: Hess Midstream LP (NYSE:HESM) ranks among the best performing energy stocks to buy now. On July 25, Morgan Stanley resumed covering Hess Midstream LP (NYSE:HESM) with an Equalweight rating and a $48 price target. The update follows the merger between HESM sponsor Hess Corporation and Chevron. Chevron is now the general partner and dominant stakeholder, […]

headline: The Leaner, Meaner Chevron Is Ready to Fight
summary: CEO Mike Wirth is overhauling the oil giant’s ‘nice’ corporate culture, getting tougher not just on his employees but also on rivals and the politicians standing in his way.
